gf-3.6.10: Grammatical Framework

Safe HaskellSafe-Inferred
LanguageHaskell2010

PGF.Haskell

Contents

Description

Auxiliary types and functions for use with grammars translated to Haskell with gf -output-format=haskell -haskell=concrete

Synopsis

  • class EnumAll a where
    • enumAll :: [a]
  • table :: (EnumAll k, Ord k) => [a] -> k -> a
  • type Str = [Tok]
  • data Tok
    • = TK String
    • | TP [([Prefix], Str)] Str
    • | BIND
    • | SOFT_BIND
    • | CAPIT
  • type Prefix = String
  • fromStr :: Str -> String
  • class Has_s r a | r -> a where
    • proj_s :: r -> a
  • data R_s t = R_s t
  • to_R_s :: Has_s r t => r -> R_s t
  • (+++) :: Applicative f => f [a] -> f [a] -> f [a]
  • (!) :: Monad m => (t -> m (m a)) -> t -> m a
  • (!$) :: (Functor m, Monad m) => (a1 -> m a) -> m a1 -> m a
  • (!*) :: (Applicative m, Monad m) => m (a1 -> m a) -> m a1 -> m a

Common record types

class Has_s r a | r -> a where

Overloaded function to project the s field from any record type

data R_s t

Haskell representation of the GF record type {s:t}

Constructors

to_R_s :: Has_s r t => r -> R_s t

Coerce from any record type {...,s:t,...} field to the supertype {s:t}
